Class ParticipantsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • morepeople.android.app.ParticipantsAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class ParticipantsAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    ParticipantsAdapter extends BaseAdapter and includes methods for the participant list
